page.title: 05Industry in Aboyne
page.content: {Industry:} The Aboyne{Business Centre}was opened at the beginning of 1984 and is situated in the newly renovated building of the old school. It attracted several{businesses}including a Hairdresser, an Architectural Practice, a Dentist and a Home Design Studio. Most of the businesses were in other premises before moving to the centre and all would agree it is suitable for their needs. The only disadvantage that the centre possesses is that it is slightly away from the main centre where the shops are and that there is a slight lack of sign posts pointing to the centre. The centre offered larger premises and in some cases more modern premises than employers had previously been in and all feel that it was to their advantage moving there.
